briefTitle: Open-Label Study of the Long Term Tolerability and Safety of Atomoxetine in Children With FASD and ADD/ADHD
officialTitle: An Open-label Study of the Long Term Tolerability and Safety of Atomoxetine in Treating the Inattention, Impulsivity and Hyperactivity in Children With Fetal-Alcohol Syndrome or Effects.

interventions.name: Atomoxetine
otherNames: Brand Name: Strattera, Serial Number: 76306506, ACT

summary: Determine if atomoxetine is safe and well tolerated by children with fetal alcohol syndrome.
